cab.content: 41THIS DOOUiMT IS THE PROPERTY OP HI a BRIMIO GOTOMMCABINET. LEAGUE OP NATIONSDISPUTE BETWEEN LITHUANIA AND POLANDResolution adopted by the Council on November 2lst, 1920.The Council decided that the Secretary-General should communicate with the Danish, Norwegian, Netherlands, and Swedish Governments to ask them if they were disposed to participate in the formation of the contingent of troops to be employed in the plebiscite area, and to supply 100 men each.2 Whitehall Gardens, 3.W. 1st December, 1920.Confidential 0 * j? * 2212 *
